option: During arithmetic analysis, the computations represented in the flow-graph elements (steps) are translated to Presburger relations. This option determines whether the translation joins consecutive steps from one basic block into a joint data-flow-relation (joint arithmetic effect) which covers as many steps as possible (before some storage cell is reassigned a second new value). The aim is to simplify the Presburger expression of the data-flow by reducing the number of "copy" constraints and the number of joined relations.
